issue.title: Real-time cartography
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

EasySDI MAP could easily be extended to allow real-time cartography.

This new feature would add two parameters on layers defined in the MAP component :
- is the layer exposed real-time  data : yes/no
- reload frequency : interval between each call to the service

A new MAP tool would be added to activate the real-time functionnality.

When activated, this functionnality will automatically reload real-time layers in the map using the OpenLayers features.
